name: MIS All Transfer Balances Report
description:
Is an alternative to FIN0027 Report of Transfer Balances and shows all account transactions and advances transferred between establishments, not just those connected to a Prisoners transfer date. Transaction dates prompt at run time.
FIN0075 - v00.00.01 Last Modified 17/03/2017

dataset.name: Transfer In
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2102' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END AS SPENDS_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2103' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END AS SAVINGS_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2101' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END AS PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTION, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE, AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('08-11-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('09-11-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_DATE('08-11-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') - 1 AND TO_DATE('09-11-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) AND AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'TIR')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, INITIALS, SURNAME, SPENDS_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, SAVINGS_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTION, TRANSACTION_TYPE, TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, ACCOUNT_CODE, DAY_DATE, TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC, TXN_ID, 'TBD' AS V_CASELOAD_OUT, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSFER_OUT.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'TOR' AND TRANSFER_OUT.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2102 THEN TRANSFER_OUT.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_SPENDS_AMO31, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSFER_OUT.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'TOR' AND TRANSFER_OUT.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2101 THEN TRANSFER_OUT.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_PRIVATE_AM32, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSFER_OUT.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'TOR' AND TRANSFER_OUT.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2103 THEN TRANSFER_OUT.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_SAVINGS_AM32, V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_PRIVATE_AMOUNT || V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_SAVINGS_AMOUNT || V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_SPENDS_AMOUNT AS V_ACCOUNT_TOTALS_OUT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Transfer Out
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2102' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END AS SPENDS_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2103' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END AS SAVINGS_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2101' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END AS PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTION, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE, AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('08-11-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('09-11-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_DATE('08-11-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') - 1 AND TO_DATE('09-11-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) AND AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'TOR')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, INITIALS, SURNAME, SPENDS_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, SAVINGS_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACTION, TRANSACTION_TYPE, TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, ACCOUNT_CODE, DAY_DATE, TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC, TXN_ID, 'TBD' AS V_CASELOAD_OUT, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSFER_OUT.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'TOR' AND TRANSFER_OUT.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2102 THEN TRANSFER_OUT.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_SPENDS_AMO31, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSFER_OUT.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'TOR' AND TRANSFER_OUT.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2101 THEN TRANSFER_OUT.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_PRIVATE_AM32, SUM(CASE WHEN TRANSFER_OUT.TRANSACTION_TYPE = 'TOR' AND TRANSFER_OUT.ACCOUNT_CODE = 2103 THEN TRANSFER_OUT.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_SAVINGS_AM32, V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_PRIVATE_AMOUNT || V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_SAVINGS_AMOUNT || V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_SPENDS_AMOUNT AS V_ACCOUNT_TOTALS_OUT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_SPENDS_AMO31
field.legacySql: =Sum(If([Transfer Out].[Transaction Type Code] = "TOR" And [Transfer Out].[Transaction Account Code] = 2102;[Transfer Out].[Transaction Entry Amount];0))

field.name: $ref:V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_PRIVATE_AM32
field.legacySql: =Sum(If([Transfer Out].[Transaction Type Code] = "TOR" And [Transfer Out].[Transaction Account Code] = 2101;[Transfer Out].[Transaction Entry Amount];0))

field.name: $ref:V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_SAVINGS_AM32
field.legacySql: =Sum(If([Transfer Out].[Transaction Type Code] = "TOR" And [Transfer Out].[Transaction Account Code] = 2103;[Transfer Out].[Transaction Entry Amount];0))

field.name: $ref:V_ACCOUNT_TOTALS_OUT
field.legacySql: =[v_Transferred OUT Private Amount]+[v_Transferred OUT Savings Amount]+[v_Transferred OUT Spends Amount]

field.name: $ref:V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_SPENDS_AMO31
field.legacySql: =Sum(If([Transfer Out].[Transaction Type Code] = "TOR" And [Transfer Out].[Transaction Account Code] = 2102;[Transfer Out].[Transaction Entry Amount];0))

field.name: $ref:V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_PRIVATE_AM32
field.legacySql: =Sum(If([Transfer Out].[Transaction Type Code] = "TOR" And [Transfer Out].[Transaction Account Code] = 2101;[Transfer Out].[Transaction Entry Amount];0))

field.name: $ref:V_TRANSFERRED_OUT_SAVINGS_AM32
field.legacySql: =Sum(If([Transfer Out].[Transaction Type Code] = "TOR" And [Transfer Out].[Transaction Account Code] = 2103;[Transfer Out].[Transaction Entry Amount];0))

field.name: $ref:V_ACCOUNT_TOTALS_OUT
field.legacySql: =[v_Transferred OUT Private Amount]+[v_Transferred OUT Savings Amount]+[v_Transferred OUT Spends Amount]
